website_summaries.verdict: The perfect choice for daily use to keep rosacea under control and prevent acne-prone skin from breaking out.
pros: This bar cleanser has a beautiful, refreshing scent that really wakes up the skin
Works effectively as a preventative acne treatment, while actively keeping redness to a minimum
Gentle enough to not irritate rosacea symptoms
Prevents oily skin from appearing shiny, while giving you a moisturized feel all day
cons: Sits at a slightly higher price point, considering how long the bar lasts

website_summaries.verdict: Artisan charcoal soap with plenty to love: fashioned from organic ingredients, it's GMO-free, not tested on animals, and has a light, pleasant scent.
pros: Works on all skin types, and helps to defeat psoriasis, rosacea, acne, and eczema
Lemongrass and lavender act as an astringent, while Shea butter moisturizes
Clears up blemishes without overly drying out, and starts to work within days
Lathers up well and rinses clean
cons: Needs to be kept in an airtight container after using or tends to melt away quickly

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a soap that works for me
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap! Wish I would have found it years ago. I’ve suffered with acne since my teens. I turned 50 this year so it’s been a long time of dealing with break outs. I can’t tell you how wonderful it is to look in the mirror and find zero blemishes on my face for over a week now. Usually I’m lucky if I can get 2-3 days a month with clear skin. My husband even noticed the difference. For reference, I have sensitive fair skin that is oily. This has decreased the oil and isn’t irritating at all. I will be ordering more. Thank you for this soap.
customer_reviews.author: Mom w/2boys

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted this to work after reading all the reviews, but unfortunately it didn't. I think if you have acne due to oily skin this product should work well for you but I have cystic acne along with adult onset acne. Hope it works for you
customer_reviews.author: nehub

customer_reviews.title: See edit... Wonderfully scratchy
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap. I wish I had more, I just ran out... Placing an order ;) It's wonderfully scratchy! Makes my skin feel so clean without feeling over-buffed or dried out. Even my face loves it. I was a bit terrified at first of the black soap going everywhere on my white shower, white grout, and white curtain... No problems though :)bo Feb 2019 edit: changed from 5 stars to 1 star. This product is no longer scratchy. I loved the bits of scratchy charcoal, but they are not in the soap anymore. The consistancy feels different too, it melts much faster now, almost like a glycerin soap.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Hall

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: This smells amazing!! I love my lush shampoo bar so I can’t belive I didn’t think to try a dash wash bar. It makes me face smell good and squeaky clean! It was recommended to cut in half to help save some of it. Good idea! I just need a good place to keep it so it can dry between uses. It came with a cardboard case to recycle and in a beeswax(?) case instead of plastic. Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It burns and smells really strong
customer_reviews.text: The smell is ridiculously strong (I cut the bar into 8 chunks and even with only one small morsel getting wet each day my entire bathroom smells like lemons) and the soap burns your face if you don't wash it off the as soon as it gets applied (if it dries on your skin it will hurt). I thought this would help w/ dry flaky skin/eczema based on other reviews (as I have dermatitis and patches of painful dry skin on my face) and it made it way worse. Although it helps with acne, it is very aggressive and not for sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia Stassen

customer_reviews.title: My experience with this product
customer_reviews.text: This product smells soooo good that’s a great thing about this product. I have acne and oily skin but when I used this product I broke out severely. My acne turned into cystic acne and the more i used it the more acne i had and the more i broke out so I stopped using this product .
customer_reviews.author: CherryBlossom1771

customer_reviews.title: I love this soap!
customer_reviews.text: I have very dry skin so I can't use anything too harsh on my face. This bar soap is perfect! I love charcoal soaps and this one is extra great because of the lavender and chamomile. I have very fair skin that shows redness very easily. This soap helps calm down the redness in my face. Plus it smells great!
customer_reviews.author: Shanbear16

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff!
customer_reviews.text: With someone with super sensitive skin (for some reason just the face area) I've been through alot of facial cleansers. Sometimes they work and sometimes they didn't and if they did, eventually they wouldn't over a short period of time. My skin dries up and cracks and gets all red and bumpy if I'm not careful but with this stuff I've been using it over a year and I've had consistent success with it. On top of having to moisture, this bar gets rid of all the dead skin and I honestly wouldn't choose any other brand. Plus the bars last forever .
customer_reviews.author: Proeliator

customer_reviews.title: Smells so Good!
customer_reviews.text: This soap bar smells delicious. It lathers well and it’s not overly drying. It cuts into smaller pieces well because it’s on the soft side. It does get mushy because it’s so soft, so you can't leave it in an area where it will get wet. It does leave a black residue after it’s been wet, but it’s easy to clean up. I’ve been using twice a day on my face and haven’t noticed any over drying of my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: This soap smells great! (I especially love washing my face in the morning with it). I have oily problem skin and wanted to try something natural on my face this soap works great on removing make up and I already see my skin impurities improving somewhat and my skin appearing brighter ( I only have had it for about week) .I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Gordo22

customer_reviews.title: Leaves skin feeling soft and clean yet not dry
customer_reviews.text: I have slightly greasy skin but it can easily dry out if I use harsh soaps on my face, so I searched for a soap with activated charcoal as an ingredient (but not the first ingredient because too much activated charcoal can dry out your skin). This was perfect as activated charcoal was one of the middle ingredients and was also comprised of other oils which keeps your skin moisturized. It left my face feeling soft and clean, yet not dry. It also has a beautiful lemongrass scent using only essential oils (no artificial ingredients). I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Jaxx

customer_reviews.title: Best charcoal soap hands down
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite soap bar for my face! I love the deep cleaning. I have very sensitive skin. So sensitive my skin reacts to my own tears when I cry. Underneath my eye it will burn and break out. Some other soaps do absolutely nothing to benefit my issue. This soap hands down took it away after only 1 wash!!! My husband loves it too. He also uses it to clear up his dandruff. I will never use another soap for my face. I hope this never ever discontinues or I'm screwed lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for Beards and skin!
customer_reviews.text: I will say while this soap isn’t the most moisturizing soap I’ve used on my face but I don’t stress that as I moisturize and use beard oil daily. My key reason for trying this soap was because it’s natural and the charcoal has proven excellent. My skin blemishes are diminished, and even my blackheads (I have oily skin and have always dealt with blackheads) have gone down. I wash my face and beard using this soap 2-3 times a week and so far I’m loving it. Deep cleans while being gentle enough to even work well in my beard. The key to a good beard is also healthy skin so this soap has been doing great for both!
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Jesurum

customer_reviews.title: face is clean, burns your eyes
customer_reviews.text: I like this for washing my face but would definitely not recommend using as an eye makeup remover or letting it around your eyes in general - makes sense, it's soap, but I have used my facewash in the past to remove eyemakeup and I can't do that with this because it burns for a good 30 seconds. Smells FANTASTIC, makes my face feel super clean and doesn't dry out my skin. Doesn't leave a weird residue like other bar soaps. I cut the soap bar into 6 squares to preserve it longer.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Natural soap heaven
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful soap. Deep cleansing without drying. Thick, luxurious lather. Smells heavenly and real - not artificial or perfumed - like the essential oils that I use all of the time. I went from a very high quality homemade charcoal and honey soap to this. I won't go back. **Read your package *** this company tells you how to use and lengthen the life of your product. I know I'll get well over two months out of one bar.
customer_reviews.author: mbindiana

customer_reviews.title: OMG THIS PRODUCT IS AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I am a beauty blogger modernblissbeauty.com. I have been suffering from acne for over 15 years. Recently my acne has been more "cystic" in nature. This product literally has made such a difference in my skin immediately. It cleans my makeup off and makes my skin feel fresh and clean. I only got 1 zit since I started using it a week ago and it's a tiny little one. It helped heal my atopic dermatitis while all other products failed! It's a must have for all skin types!
customer_reviews.author: Marlena Salerno

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic soap!
customer_reviews.text: I adore this soap. It smells divine, and it leaves my skin feeling fresh and clean without feeling dry. I have sensitive skin that is prone to dryness and blemishes, and in the three weeks I've been using this bar my skin feels great. I recently began looking for personal care products that involve less packaging, and this soap is definitely a keeper. I'm turning on the subscription for this, it is seriously that good.
customer_reviews.author: Erin DesMarais

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I just used this for the first time and I am very impressed. I have rosacea and after one use I am already impressed. It's a very mild soap and smells so yummy. After washing my face, I was most impressed that my face didn't feel dry afterwards or more importantly, itchy. So far, I don't have the all too familiar flushing that most often accompanies any use of facial soap or cleanser. Only time will tell if this will be my go to for facial cleansing, but should it turn out that it doesn't work, it will definitely be a nice body soap.
customer_reviews.author: Florida GalTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: My daughter fell in love with a similar product from a small vendor
customer_reviews.text: My daughter fell in love with a similar product from a small vendor. We were hoping this would be equal in quality. The soap immediately broke into small pieces after only a few uses. And after a few weeks of use, my sink was clogged. The plumber said that there was a lot of buildup of black beauty product. The one great thing is the scent!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Perez

customer_reviews.title: Nice, natural soap
customer_reviews.text: It works as well as any natural anti fungal soap works, I suppose. I love the packaging. The problem with charcoal soap is that it does stain all of your washcloths and towels with horrid grayish black stains and I really hate that. If you have multiple skin issues...get Puriya's Wonder Balm..it's a bit pricey but it is like gold in a bottle for impossible skin problems. I ended my search for the perfect soap once I discovered Wonder Balm. ( I am not being compensated in any way by Wonder Balm for my review...I just found a very effective product and want everyone else to find the same relief as I have.)
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I have oily skin and have always had to contend with blemishes, iv'e tried many soaps but the most effective were the ones that were in excess of $20 this product however is half that price and much more effective. I highly recommend it to people that want to have a smoother looking face!!!
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Actually works
customer_reviews.text: Great product; does what it says. I don't like scent, but if you leave the bar in the open air, the scent disappears. Not sure if this soap moisturizes, but that's not why I bought it. It clears up problems. Visible difference and improvement within a few days.
customer_reviews.author: thomasina

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Mask Acne
customer_reviews.text: My face has not broken out in years. Wearing a mask has caused a flare-up on my face, to which I was diagnosed with mask acne. My doctor suggested charcoal soap, to which most of the breakout has gone down. The smell of the soap is subtle. I ordered additional products directly from the company's website, and I have been pleased with all of their products.
customer_reviews.author: JennyLin1922

customer_reviews.title: Best soap for hormonal acne!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 56 year old female dealing with hormonal acne for about a year now. I’ve tried to stay with all natural products that are paraben and sulphate free but nothing worked. I stumbled on Yellow Bird products and so glad I did. I LOVE this soap and the face oil. I haven’t had ANY breakouts since I started using it 1 week ago and that’s a huge deal for me.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Why must my skin feel like rubber when I use natural soaps?
customer_reviews.text: I’ll update if my view changes but I was hoping this soap didn’t leave what feels like wax on my skin like most natural soaps do. I saw some people said it didn’t so I took a chance but sadly it does. I’m going to give it a fair chance but I don’t leave the shower feeling clean and my skin feels like rubber. I should have went with a body wash like I was thinking in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: I love this soap!
customer_reviews.text: I was gifted this soap a while back and the strong scent made me cautious at first, but after trying it, I love it! The exploration factor in this soap is my favorite part. If you have sensitive skin I recommend taking the company’s suggestion of working up a lather on a loofa, sponge, washcloth, etc then using the soap on your body. But I have not had any irritation if I take that suggestion in sensitive areas.
customer_reviews.author: Jordy Linkins

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Soap!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this soap! A few months ago, I started to clean up my beauty routine. I wanted to use as few chemicals on my face as possible, so when I ran across this soap I had to try it. The scent is fantastic and it actually works better on my combination skin than any other product I've used. Unlike some other reviews, my first bar lasted a good 6 months, however I only use it on my face in the mornings. I cannot recommend this soap enough!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: It great, just drying
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this, but it made my skin sooooo dry I could hardly stand it. It was painful and just got worse each day. I had to stop using it! I have crazy sensitive skin and was hoping I would be okay.
customer_reviews.author: Tai Jeppson

customer_reviews.title: Great Soap
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this soap for my granddaughter that has like eczema on her face and scalp psoriasis that be around the edges of her hair line. This works great if you use it twice a day. Her skin looks amazing and I use it sometimes too. We Love it and will continue to order it. Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: Linda P.

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: I wore a cheap necklace and broke out in a rash on my neck, across my chest and part of my back. I have fairly sensitive skin.I tried lots of different products, but none of them seem to be healing my skin. Did some research and tried this soap for a week or so and my skin is finally clearing up, rash is going away and it’s over all brighter and clearer. Definitely impressed and would recommend to anyone
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaholic

customer_reviews.title: Great natural product
customer_reviews.text: I usually never write reviews but I literally tried everything but this product not only helps with existing acne and small stubborn bumps and white heads but overtime I noticed breakouts were less frequent. I use this product along with a vitamin c serum and follow up with moisturizer and my skin hasn’t looked this good in years.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Stokes

customer_reviews.title: Major Allergic Reaction
customer_reviews.text: I had to throw this whole bar away as I had a major allergic reaction and almost had to use my Epi Pen. It caused throat swelling. I am bringing the packaging to my next allergist appointment to investigate but what a waste. It’s marketed as gentle and organic but clearly it’s not.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love!
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin that breaks out easily. I love the way this soap makes my skin feels. It is so gentle and smells amazing. On my second bar and will be planning to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Maryha A, Coughlin

customer_reviews.title: It's fine.
customer_reviews.text: I have been previously using the Neutrogena acne face bar during showers, but decided to try this after reading the reviews. Honestly, I'm not sure I notice much of a difference, but my skin isn't doing any worse either, so there's that. My one concern is that it's already feeling a little "mushy" so I'm wondering how long it's actually going to last before the bar falls apart.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Busch

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but smells great
customer_reviews.text: This soap smells wonderful! It has a very mild grainy feeling, sort of like baking soda, so I am not sure if ok for sensitive skin. It does not last long but I think it has helped my skin. It does not leave a dark grime on the shower as it rinses fairly easily.
customer_reviews.author: Lili B

customer_reviews.title: It really works!
customer_reviews.text: I loved it, definitely is handmade and organic using it while I'm pregnant and I've noticed result since the second week of use. Important to mention that I cut a piece of it becase as it's organic I have to keep it dry to avoid it get ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Mariel

customer_reviews.title: Body odor relief??
customer_reviews.text: I've always sweat a little under my arms, lil musty as they say. Since using this ...nada!!! Just took a wiff now ..nothing. I just lather the charcoal soap up place under my arm for a minute or so and rinse in shower. I'm guessing it removes toxins that cause odor. I use it on my face also and it helps bring blackheads to the surface. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's the best, and I've tried everything
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough good things about this product! I suffer from Roscea and adult acne, and even with my prescriptions I still get "flairs." Within 4 days of using this soap on my face, my redness cleared to the best it's been in YEARS and within 10 days my acne was gone. I still use my prescriptions, but this has become more valuable to me. I have very reactive and picky skin and this makes my face look and feel amazing. It will be a recurring order for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: i absolutely love the smell of the lavendar and lemon grass scent
customer_reviews.text: i absolutely love the smell of the lavendar and lemon grass scent. its relaxing and not over powering. i tend to suffer from eczema flare ups in the summer and i'm always on the hunt for soap that will help sooth my skin during those times. i'm so glad i found this! will definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Izza Renee

customer_reviews.title: It dried out my skin so bad after 3 uses I gave up
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this, after reading reviews, hoping it would help the eczema/psoriasis that I have on my face, hands, and feet. It dried out my skin so bad after 3 uses I gave up. I thought it would be good for my teenage daughter who has oily/ blackhead prone skin but it dried hers out even Judy using it every other day!! We're still trying to replace the moisture and stop the peeling!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Seltzer

customer_reviews.title: One of the only things that work for my KP and acne
customer_reviews.text: I struggle with acne on my shoulders and chest and using this regularly works like a charm. It beats much more expensive products. I also have keratosis pilaris on my legs and I've noticed some improvement when using this soap. I will rotate this product out every 3-4 days to avoid my skin becoming too dry but I love it and I've been a fan for almost two years. The only drawback is that this can be too hash for areas where you have extremely sensitive skin ( I can't use it on my face for that reason).
customer_reviews.author: Kimberlee Malone

customer_reviews.title: Lovely scent and helps with acne!
customer_reviews.text: I have been suffering from horrible face and back acne for months now. Decided to give this a try and after a week of use, my acne has significantly calmed down. Also love the scent. I will definitely purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: MissMonika

customer_reviews.title: Contains SunFlower oil aka bad for nickel eczema
customer_reviews.text: I wish they would show a picture of ingredients, or list all ingredients. There's a lot more in here than lavender, charcoal, and lemon grass. I got this for eczema, but my eczema is due to metal allergies, like nickel. Sunflower and all seeds are high in nickel, so is oatmeal which a lot of these eczema products have. I think it may be making my eczema worse, im not 100% sure though, but I wouldnt have bought it if i known it had sunflower oil in it. Perhaps ill try to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Ho

customer_reviews.title: over powering scent and drys out skin
customer_reviews.text: the smell was over powering, and left skin dry! like regular soap for the price was expecting more
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: I have roseacea. I've had it for 16 years, and I've tried A LOT of remedies. Recently, I've been having more episodes and my face looks like a tomato. I bought some Neem facial wash and it dries out my face wicked. So, I went looking again. I'm happy with the soap so far, it lathers nicely, smells nice and makes my skin soft soft soft!! Most important, NO MORE ROSEACEA ATTACKS so far. I use the soap, follow with my regular treatment ( metrogel) and my skin says tomato free all day! Try it !
customer_reviews.author: suzzie

customer_reviews.title: Nothing has ever worked as wonderfully as this soap
customer_reviews.text: I have to say, I have tried MANY different expensive ways to try to clear up my face and get rid of my acne. Nothing has ever worked as wonderfully as this soap. I went from having acne prone skin even with my dermatologist prescribed medications to having clear, flawless, and glowing skin in a week. However, after the first use I saw a felt a difference. This stuff is amazing and I highly reccomend you buy it! For being so inexpensive, this soap is wonderful. It also smells amazing and leaves your skin feeling fresh and rejuvinated. I wash my face with this once in the morning and once before bed. BUY IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Janelle Heaton

customer_reviews.title: I will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, I LOVE it. I.have tried everything for acne to no avail. Until I gave thi soap a try. I have never seen my face this free of acne. Everyone around me notice my smooth face..I have to make sure I can never run out this soap. And No, this review wasn't for an attachment. It is real and genuine.
customer_reviews.author: Cas💕❤

customer_reviews.title: I really like the smell of the soap and it does a ...
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and have a hard time with soaps for my face. My long time soap was discontinued. So as I use the last of it, I was looking for another option. I read these reviews and figured, I should try this soap. I have to say that I have had no problems. I really like the smell of the soap and it does a nice job. I will buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for skin issues
customer_reviews.text: This is the best face soap I have ever used! I have always had acne here and there and since using this soap I have had little, if any, acne at all! Even when pregnant, I used this soap and never really broke out and I broke out like crazy with my first (both are girls). I can't say enough good things about this soap. I also use it on my body where I have (eczema) and it has helped immensely. It makes my skin feel amazing and I recommend it to all my friends and family!
customer_reviews.author: Maegen

customer_reviews.title: This One Is A Keeper
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely bar of Charcoal Soap. The fragrance is sweet yet subtle. I appreciated the seller/maker emailing with advice on cutting the bar in half to make it last longer. I did so and plan to purchase more from The Yellow Bird before it fly's off the shelf. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Debi

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT, it smells good, feels good, and really does clean well! I use this then rub coconut oil as my moisturizer and i smell yummy (my husband likes it too) this really is a wonderful soap, when you buy this soap cut it in half it really does last longer, for me anyways since i use a body scrubber with this soap. Again LOVE LOVE LOVE!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather McClatchie

customer_reviews.title: Skin became softer & smoother
customer_reviews.text: i feel like this soap made my skin LOOK & FEEL super soft & smooth. i feel like it evened my complexion & faded acne scars. smells so good & my skin feels super clean after washing it off. be sure to tone & moisturize after or else it could feel a bit drying!
customer_reviews.author: Arianna Ong

customer_reviews.title: Nice natural clean and soothing to my sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t leave my face itchy or dry since it cleanses with mostly oils
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Softens and Heals Skin
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Soap. I use this for my face. The first time I used it, I could clearly tell that the shea butter was kicking into my skin. My face felt buttery smooth. I've noticed after awhile of using this soap, that my skin improved a bit. I split my bar in half and use it for travel and for my skincare routine at the sink. What a superb product.
customer_reviews.author: Maestranza

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT, Keeps the acne away.
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell, and I use this everyday and keeps the acne away! I use the African black soap every other day and this charcoal lavender soap the other times and that has kept my acne away. Best soap I ever bought. It does seem to go fast tho but it’s probably because I use it in the shower also, not just for my face
customer_reviews.author: Surrey Summer

customer_reviews.title: Great soap VERY HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: First off I’m very picky about smell...I love the scent of this soap. I have bad acne and I typically don’t use ANYTHING on my face. I got this for my face and it’s working great. And lasts a long time I cut the bar in half like they said to do. I will be buying it again when I need to
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap and can’t recommend it enough. I use it with my proactiv and use it before I use the proactiv wash, then follow up with the other 2 steps of proactiv like normal. My skin is super stubborn and sensitive skin , the proactiv alone wasn’t doing it like I wanted but since I’ve been using this soap my skin has cleared up a lot more. Awesome product!!!!! Thank you guys for making this, it has been a life changer for me
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Rizzo

customer_reviews.title: Great cleanser
customer_reviews.text: I really like this soap. My skin feels cleansed and moisturized...not tight feeling. I cut my bar into quarters and let it dry on a soap dish. Only dislike is it discolors my washcloth so I no longer soap it up with my washcloth.
customer_reviews.author: DLM

customer_reviews.title: Loved the smell, packaging and small batch feel to the soap
customer_reviews.text: Loved the smell, packaging and small batch feel to the soap. Lifts your spirits in the morning due to the essential oils. Leaves you clean and smelling nice. I would give 5 stars however my only complaint is that it leaves your skin feeling dry after using. Not sure if this is due to the natural ingredients or just the choice of ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Adam O.

customer_reviews.title: but it does make my face feel super clean! And I love that I can cut ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it does anything for my face specifically, but it does make my face feel super clean! And I love that I can cut it up and bring it with me on my travels. It's perfect because I only need a small piece to take with me for my travels and it doesn't count as a liquid!
customer_reviews.author: d

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product
customer_reviews.text: My daughter love this soap!! Wished we had known about it sooner before buying the over-priced Proactiv, but you live and learn. It has really helped her acne, she had oily skin and would break out constantly and even though it's been a little over a week since she's been using yellow bird soap her acne is clearing and no more oily skin. Will definitely buy more, thanks for making a great product 😊
customer_reviews.author: ML

customer_reviews.title: Take Me Away With Your Big, Black, Waxy Monster!
customer_reviews.text: Hey, it's a bar of soap w/ some carbon added to help control stank and provide some friction. "Stank with friction" was my stage name when I danced to pay for college.
customer_reviews.author: Koko

customer_reviews.title: Was suffering from acne and dark spots. I've tried ...
customer_reviews.text: Was suffering from acne and dark spots. I've tried do many products, some only work for a while some didn't work at all. I've been using this soap for over a month now and already I've seen an improvement in my skin tone and the dark spots are going away. Just ordered my second bar.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Sassy

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Soap
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent soap. I'm using it on my face which is very sensitive to just about everything. I am amazed at the results. The Charcoal Soap Bar is nondrying and leaves my skin feeling soft and clean. This sounds like a commercial but it's true! Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne B

customer_reviews.title: Very good product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to use for my lota under my neck and blackheads on my face as well as acne spots. i must say that this product worked really well to lighten my skin especially for the lota. The smell is AMAZING! Will buy from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea G.

customer_reviews.title: Really nice natural soap.
customer_reviews.text: This soap lathers well, and the lemon scent (I don't smell lavender) is really fresh and nice. Used about a week, and my face has had no adverse effects! Leaves it feeling clean but not dried out and screaming for a moiisturizer. I really like it and would recommend it for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Salmonharted

customer_reviews.title: It leaves this charcoal residue but nothing that can't be removed.
customer_reviews.text: It has a nice scent. The bar maybe less square would be better. After a couole of use it gets a bit messy. I think it has to do with the oils from the soap. Now, you will feel the difference between regular soap and this one. More smooth, refreshing, clean, etc. Has a nice lather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell, but it made my dermatitis flare up
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this soap so badly! I bought it to use for my face to help clear my acne. I love the smell & feel of this soap. Unfortunately, it made my perioral dermatitis flare up. I now use it as a body soap & that's working well.
customer_reviews.author: Kate N.

customer_reviews.title: Work great on my skin
customer_reviews.text: Work great on my skin! I've been using different products for my arm eczema and this soap worked great! The bumps on my arms dramatically disappeared plus the soap smells good and leaves my skin clean and smooth. I will definitely reorder this product.
customer_reviews.author: Marie R

customer_reviews.title: I really like the smell of the lavender lemongrass soap
customer_reviews.text: I really like the smell of the lavender lemongrass soap. I wasn't expecting it to be quite so strong, but not in a bad way, the other half of the bar is in my cabinet and gives off a nice fragrance when I open the door. So far it is has done as good a job as my previous charcoal face soap.
customer_reviews.author: KDelzeith

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap! I have combination, acne-prone sensitive skin most soaps and cleansers irritate my skin and don't do much for acne. This soap is gentle enough to use daily, smells great, and helps keep my skin clear! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: kaye basedow

customer_reviews.title: Clearing up my skin
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this nightly on my face for about 2 weeks now and I do see an improvement! Fewer blackheads overall and I am going to try using this twice a day to see if it will completely clear up the blackheads or if it will cause my skin to be too dry. I have heard that charcoal soaps are very drying, so I have been using vitamin A oil on a more regular basis, alternatively using my usual night facial cream.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy shops for bargains

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This soap makes my face feel SO clean and does not dry out my skin. I have been using this product for almost a month now. It feels great on my skin and I use it two to three times a day over my entire face. Yes, it seems expensive, but it lasts. I can barely tell that it has been used thus far. The smell is also pleasing and not overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanell

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, helps.with acne.
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Will buy again... smells amazing, bought for son to help with breakouts, and works well..
customer_reviews.author: Kware

customer_reviews.title: Very nice customer service
customer_reviews.text: I had been using the soap for a week. It smells amazing and has a great consistency. However, my skin started to get very dried out. I emailed them and they sent me a refund and some nice instructions on how to help my situation. The letter and attention given were very nice and I am encouraged to keep trying.
customer_reviews.author: AMZCustomer

customer_reviews.title: worth it!
customer_reviews.text: This soap feels really good. I am not always a lemon scented fan, but I like this one okay. I ordered this a couple times and then decided I shouldn't be buying expensive soaps. When I stopped using it the skin on my face noticed. This soap makes me feel good after I wash.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie T

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful fragrance
customer_reviews.text: This soap smells amazing! It is packaged beautifully. It leaves my skin feeling soft and smooth. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Searcy

customer_reviews.title: Not a reliable acne treatment
customer_reviews.text: I know this product wasn't listed as an acne treatment, but it was recommended based on all the reviews. I've had acne for years, enough that I have never had a day without a least one breakout somewhere on my face or back. The acne on my back is especially painful and if this soap could just help that it would be amazing, but it did not. I have noticed no difference. I have since switched to the new proactiv MD, and that has actually worked. So if you like soap that smells nice, great. This purchase is totally for you. If you have constant acne like I do, don't get your hopes up from all these other reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Product
customer_reviews.text: This soap is smooth and pleasantly scented. Does not leave your skin dry or tight.
customer_reviews.author: S. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Not what I exspected NO!
customer_reviews.text: I didnt like this soap I bought a charcoal scrub I like much betterthat helped my acne didn't like this at all
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline howell

customer_reviews.title: One of my fav soaps
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap. smells great. lathers well. will definitely repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Hoffman0920

customer_reviews.title: all time favorite soap!
customer_reviews.text: Makes my skin clear and soft, and smells amazing!!! I love that I can use it on my body + face, and I feel good about it because the lack of harsh chemicals. The company is lovely too, their customer service sent me several really nice emails about how to get the most out of the soap, and encouraged me to reach out if I had any questions/complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful soap
customer_reviews.text: Once you get used to the black soap, you realize it is a great product and your skin feels wonderful. Thank you for the super fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy E. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I get acne on my back, which is humiliating. This not only cleared it up, it smells magnificent. I use this for my body and back. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this charcoal bar
customer_reviews.text: I waited a couple of months before reviewing. LOVE this charcoal bar! I've had little red bumps on certain areas of my body for years now. After about 2 months of using this product I see a notable reduction in the bumps. I've also gotten remarks on how clear my skin has looked! Love, love, love. Can't say enough about this product
customer_reviews.author: Kim Parsons

customer_reviews.title: I will for sure be buying this again.
customer_reviews.text: I love this soap it smells so good and feels great on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Missy Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Too drying
customer_reviews.text: I wrote a review before giving it 5 stars after using once, but after using it for about a week, my skin is dry, especially my hands. The scent is wonderful, but the drying is too much for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Awesome face soap
customer_reviews.text: This is some really nice face soap. It feels good when you wash your face with it and even better it has the awesome aroma that reminds me a little of the cereal Trix (not an exact match but similar IMO). I haven't used it that long so I can so much else, other than so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Great soap for my face
customer_reviews.text: I use this to clean by face twice a day. It smells great and my face certainly feels clean and soft afterwards. The bar is quite large, and I will follow the advice of others and cut in half next time I purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Smooth/great smell
customer_reviews.text: I do find this bar of soap noticeably messy. Great lemon grass scent.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Esteller

customer_reviews.title: Great product for natural skincare!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time ordering! The bar can be cut in half and it extends the life of your product. It cleans well without over drying. I use before applying the blue tansy oil. I’m a huge fan of the products and absolutely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: melissa wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: The product came quickly, as did the email from the company with extra tips on care and use. Soap has nice smell, rinses clean and did not dry out my skin. Will continue to use. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Darla

customer_reviews.title: Gentle Yet Deep Cleaning
customer_reviews.text: I was trying to find a natural face wash that was good for skin that is prone to breakouts without it being too harsh or drying out my skin. This product is a nice balance, and my face feels very clean but not stripped of moisture. It also lasts a long time. I actually cut the bar in half and use one half in the shower and one half in my travel bag.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Graeve

customer_reviews.title: Way too expensive for what it does.
customer_reviews.text: Does not do too much aside from leaving you with a sense of freshness. Does not really get rid of back acne like advertised and if you use it too much it actually makes your skin break out even more!
customer_reviews.author: rafael

customer_reviews.title: Customer For Life!
customer_reviews.text: I love it and makes my skin look radiant. Just ordered my second bar! I'm going to gift one you my mom with Rosacea too. Lavender & Lemongrass smells wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Duff

customer_reviews.title: good smell
customer_reviews.text: came as expected. I like the smell of the soap.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Clean and nice scent!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious soap. I have oily skin and when I'm done with this soap i feel refreshed and so clean!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaholic

customer_reviews.title: I love this product again. For teenagers with oddly oily/dry skin, I recommend it so that whatever product you use goes on pure
customer_reviews.text: In spite of my 62 year old clear, dry, skin, I have never found a skin product that gave me the sense; -Here goes, we're starting from scratch. It's a blessing and a curse, Whatever happens now, it's on me. I love this product, ten thousand times.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen B. Havener

customer_reviews.title: great soap
customer_reviews.text: This was great soap. It suds up nice and smell great. I got the lavender and lemon balm. Will buy it again and try the difference herbs they put in their soap
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Carraway

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of this and it doesn't make me break out at all!
customer_reviews.author: haley

product_meta.title: Activated Charcoal Soap Bar - Natural Detox Face Soap & Body Soap for Acne, Blackheads, Eczema, Psoriasis, Sensitive Skin. Black Soap Facial Cleanser for Oily Skin. Vegan, Non-GMO, Organic Ingredients
feature_bullets: CLEARS SKIN NATURALLY for a healthy, soft glow. Our Charcoal Soap is great for men and women with all skin types! A great everyday organic face cleanser and body wash for those suffering with acne, eczema, psoriasis, or rosacea.

CHEMICAL-FREE SKINCARE. Made with the highest grade natural and certified organic ingredients that are less likely to irritate or dry sensitive skin. Formulated with activated charcoal and moisturizing shea butter to remove blemishes and impurities.

A PERFECT FACE AND BODY WASH. We make our soap by hand in the USA through traditional, small batch, cold processed method to best preserve the quality and effectiveness of our all-natural ingredients.
LATHER UP AND FEEL AMAZING with the calming scent of lemongrass and lavender, two powerful essential oils that have antifungal and astringent properties.
GUARANTEED RESULTS or your money back. If you don't love our artisan made soap as much as we do, we'll be happy to provide you with a full refund.
